cards.title: My Music
cards.description: See pictures and videos of me performing music, or check out some of the music I have written.

cards.title: Coding Experience
cards.description: Learn About my Coding experience, and check out projects that I have done in the past. You can also ownload games and projects I have made.

cards.title: About Me
cards.description: Get to know me a little bit better, and learn more about my life and my experiences.

cards.title: Game Development
cards.description: I used to be really into game development, and still play around with it from time to time. Check out some of those projects here.

cards.title: Online Resume
cards.description: If you are a recruiter, or want to know more about my professional experience, you can check out this online version of my resume. I try to keep it as up to date as possible.

cards.title: My Contact Info
cards.description: Want to get in touch with me? Click the link below to find out the best way to reach out.
